# World glacier explorer

OGGM-edu app: for more info, visit [edu.oggm.org](http://edu.oggm.org/en/latest/explorer.html)

Authors:
- [Philipp Rudiger](https://github.com/philippjfr) (Anaconda Inc.)
- [Zora Schirmeister](https://github.com/zschirmeister) (University of Innsbruck)
- [Patrick Schmitt](https://github.com/pat-schmitt) (University of Innsbruck)
- [Fabien Maussion](https://github.com/fmaussion) (University of Innsbruck)

License: MIT

## Help us with a new translation

If you want to help us to add a new translation (or correct a typo in the existing ones), please check the [international.py](international.py) file. It should be self-explanatory! You can send us the edited file per mail or with a pull-request. Thanks!!!
